title: Year-Round Discounts
description: Receive an exclusive 15% discount on all Srey Mango products, all year long.

title: Priority Experience Booking
description: Get early access to book our popular farm experiences before they open to the public.

title: Share of the Harvest
description: Earn loyalty points based on the success of the mango harvest, redeemable for products.

title: Exclusive Access
description: Be invited to NFT-holder-only events, including virtual tastings and Q&As with farmers.

title: Digital Collectible
description: Own a unique piece of digital art representing your support for our 2025 season.

title: Direct Impact
description: Your minting fee directly funds our sustainable farming initiatives and community support.
